categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook fiction

nodes.text: Bounty's Due is a short story by Peter Schweighofer that was published in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

Guri, a Black Sun lieutenant, was to meet with the Ubese bounty hunter Boushh on Gelgelar. Boushh had captured alive a Nimbanel who was the target of a bounty issued by Prince Xizor, but was holding out for extra credits. While meeting with Guri, Boushh became distracted when he was bitten by a dinko. Guri took advantage of the situation, killed the bounty hunter and left with the restrained Nimbanel.
